title: season 8 is ending in a few. as season 8 draws to a close, what can you reflect on the most?
body:
this season we got new reworks for underused champions like nunu, as well as runes reforged, the odyssey event, etc.
we had a couple of downsides and broken champs, but lets end this on a high note.

what were your most memorable moments of season 8?
what would you have done differently if you could go back for a do-over?
how much do you think your gameplay has improved over the course of the season?
